content: this is my simple all in one party pig pattern this pattern used two yarns held together to give it its colourful effect you can use any ply yarn and different ply s it all works it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts very useful for gifts as it works up quickly and easily great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn the size is roughly 12 cm long including the tail and 8 cm high any size yarn and hook can be used please see my other all in one patterns
